Text: enjoyed original airing but now not so sure... jar jar girl is annoying and makes it feel like a kids show. defiance fell into the same trap as star trek did (all aliens are humanoid biped), apparently if we travel the vastness of space the only thing that separates us from all other aliens is the color of our skin and the shape of our forehead :)

Jackoff, i totally know what you mean.
Tho the thing that rubbed me the wrong way was how bad the cgi scenes was.. and that they had to CGI the car.. i mean..
The only trap is that of a production budget. Want cooler aliens? Donate to the show and pay for them! lol

Ep 4 doesn't air for another 3-4 hours depending on your region.

Thanks for the up. Loving the show and the game. Wish I could pull files off my PVR so I could save my bandwidth :P
thanks and cheers for this u/l
